subject: Speedskating
lead_paragraph: Shani Davis of the United States won the men’s 1,000 meters at the Grand World Cup speedskating finals in Berlin in 1 minute 9.24 seconds to clinch the overall title.
snippet: Shani Davis of the United States won the men’s 1,000 meters at the Grand World Cup speedskating finals in Berlin in 1 minute 9.24 seconds to clinch the overall title.
